entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 9:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of rain mixed with wet snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
